description: Let b(n) = A048275(n) = maximal number of divisors of C(n,k) for k=0..n; sequence gives smallest value of k achieving b(n).
example: n=50, the number of divisors of {C[ 50,k ]} is maximal if k=24,26. It is 5184. The central(median) value, A00005[ C[ 50,25 ] ]=4608 is smaller.
author: _Labos Elemer_
